entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • InputText crash if mistyped attribute #54852
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #54851
  • Why Do I need call JS Code in Blazor apps? #54850
  • Perf improvement: single_query, updates #54849

Closed

  • Perf regression: caching, multiple_queries, plainTextSansFilter #54844
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts #54845

PullRequests

Updated

  • Use SearchValues throughout dotnet/aspnetcore (part 2) #54804
    Perf, community-contribution, area-networking
  • Introduce a logger provider that counts warnings and errors #54846
    area-dataprotection
  • #51611 - Extended Blazor server and webassembly options to match web format. #54649
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Make types in Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.KeyManagement.Internal internal #54707
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun
  • Allow retries in DefaultKeyResolver.CanCreateAuthenticatedEncryptor #54711
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun
  • Support resolving OpenApiPaths entries from document #54847
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal
  • Avoid O(N) string[] allocations for N header values in GetCommaSeparatedValues #54808
    Perf, area-networking
  • Handle JSON comments and trailing commas in user-jwts #54826
    area-commandlinetools, community-contribution
